# cancel()

**Instance Method**

Cancels a previously started request.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancel()
```

## Discussion

When you cancel a request, the delegate is not called with an error.

## Controlling the Request

- **start()**: Sends the request to the Apple App Store.

items.description: Sends the request to the Apple App Store.
